DOC.brief_summary: The goal study identify chemical compound blood sputum ( i.e. , biomarkers ) associate objective measurement health status patient cystic fibrosis ( CF ) . This study build upon observation blood level hepcidin-25 , protein regulate body us store iron , vary CF pulmonary exacerbation ( CFPE ) .
DOC.brief_title: Biomarkers Iron Homeostasis Responses Cystic Fibrosis Pulmonary Exacerbation ( CFPE ) Treatment
DOC.criteria: Inclusion Criteria ( require screen visit ) : Diagnosis CF confirm history positive chloride sweat test and/or CFTR mutation analysis ; History consistent sputum production occasion ; FEV1 % great equal 75 % best measurement previous 6 month ; 1 hospitalization CFPE treatment intravenous antibiotic within previous year ; Absence CFPE ( i.e. , Akron Pulmonary Exacerbation Score < 5 ) ; Not admit hospital within previous 3 week ; Body weight great equal 75 % best measurement previous 6 month ; Provision sign informedconsent study protocol ; 18 < Age > 65 Women pregnant lactating ; Subject meet Inclusion criterion ; Recent and/or persistent visible blood sputum ( hemoptysis ) ; Rescue use oral antibiotic within previous 3 week , define antibiotic use health deterioration rather chronic suppression
